dcterms:description: Multi-organ CT segmentation dataset consisting of 30 abdominal CT scans with annotations for 13 organs. After pre-processing, 3,779 slices were extracted, split into training and test sets.

dcterms:description: Dataset for automatic cardiac diagnosis involving 100 samples with segmentation of the right ventricle, left ventricle, and myocardium. The dataset is split into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: ACDC (Automated Cardiac Diagnosis)

dcterms:description: Electron microscopy dataset containing 30 images of the Drosophila brain, each sized 512x512. The dataset is split into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: EM (Electron Microscopy)

dcterms:description: Dataset for melanoma detection in dermoscopy images using texture and color features, containing images used for training and testing.
